jbt.model.task.composite
Class ModelComposite

java.lang.Object
  jbt.model.core.ModelTask
      jbt.model.task.composite.ModelComposite
Direct Known Subclasses:
ModelDynamicPriorityList, ModelParallel, ModelRandomSelector, ModelRandomSequence, ModelSelector, ModelSequence, ModelStaticPriorityList
public abstract class ModelComposite
extends ModelTask

A ModelComposite task is a task with several children, whose evaluation depends on the evaluation of its children.

Constructor Detail

ModelComposite

public ModelComposite(ModelTask guard,
                      ModelTask... children)
Constructor.

Constructs a ModelComposite with some children. A ModelComposite must have at least one child.

Parameters:
guard - the guard of the ModelComposite.
children - the list of children. Must have at least one element.
